backupManagementType.Description: Type of backup management for the backed up item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql', 'AzureStorage', 'AzureWorkload', 'DefaultBackup'

sourceResourceId.Description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

itemId.Description: ID of the item which is getting protected, In case of Azure Vm , it is ProtectedItemId

policyId.Description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of this backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'NotProtected', 'Protecting', 'Protected', 'ProtectionFailed'

protectionIntentItemType.Description: Azure Recovery Services Vault specific protection intent item.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

protectionIntentItemType.Description: IaaS VM specific backup protection intent item.

storageTypeState.Description: Locked or Unlocked. Once a machine is registered against a resource, the storageTypeState is always Locked. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Locked', 'Unlocked'

enhancedSecurityState.Description: Enabled or Disabled. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Enabled', 'Disabled'

softDeleteFeatureState.Description: Soft Delete feature state. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Enabled', 'Disabled'

encryptionAtRestType.Description: Encryption At Rest Type. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'MicrosoftManaged', 'CustomerManaged'

provisioningState.Description: Gets or sets provisioning state of the private endpoint connection. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Deleting', 'Failed', 'Pending'

privateEndpoint.Description: The Private Endpoint network resource that is linked to the Private Endpoint connection

status.Description: Gets or sets the status. Possible values include: 'Pending', 'Approved', 'Rejected', 'Disconnected'

backupManagementType.Description: Type of backup management for the backed up item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql', 'AzureStorage', 'AzureWorkload', 'DefaultBackup'

workloadType.Description: Type of workload this item represents. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'VM', 'FileFolder', 'AzureSqlDb', 'SQLDB', 'Exchange', 'Sharepoint', 'VMwareVM', 'SystemState', 'Client', 'GenericDataSource', 'SQLDataBase', 'AzureFileShare', 'SAPHanaDatabase', 'SAPAseDatabase'

sourceResourceId.Description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

policyId.Description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

lastRecoveryPoint.Description: Timestamp when the last (latest) backup copy was created for this backup item.

backupSetName.Description: Name of the backup set the backup item belongs to

createMode.Description: Create mode to indicate recovery of existing soft deleted data source or creation of new data source. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Default', 'Recover'

deferredDeleteTimeInUTC.Description: Time for deferred deletion in UTC

isScheduledForDeferredDelete.Description: Flag to identify whether the DS is scheduled for deferred delete

deferredDeleteTimeRemaining.Description: Time remaining before the DS marked for deferred delete is permanently deleted

isDeferredDeleteScheduleUpcoming.Description: Flag to identify whether the deferred deleted DS is to be purged soon

isRehydrate.Description: Flag to identify that deferred deleted DS is to be moved into Pause state

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the fileshare represented by this backup item.

protectionStatus.Description: Backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of this backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'IRPending', 'Protected', 'ProtectionError', 'ProtectionStopped', 'ProtectionPaused'

lastBackupStatus.Description: Last backup operation status. Possible values: Healthy, Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.Description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information about Azure File Share backup item.

protectedItemType.Description: Azure File Share workload-specific backup item.

resourceHealthStatus.Description: Resource Health Status. Possible values include: 'Healthy', 'TransientDegraded', 'PersistentDegraded', 'TransientUnhealthy', 'PersistentUnhealthy', 'Invalid'

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: Number of available backup copies associated with this backup item.

policyState.Description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

resourceState.Description: Indicates the state of this resource. Possible values are from enum ResourceState {Invalid, Active, SoftDeleted, Deleted}

resourceStateSyncTime.Description: The resource state sync time for this backup item.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

virtualMachineId.Description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the virtual machine represented by this item.

protectionStatus.Description: Backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of this backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'IRPending', 'Protected', 'ProtectionError', 'ProtectionStopped', 'ProtectionPaused'

healthStatus.Description: Health status of protected item. Possible values include: 'Passed', 'ActionRequired', 'ActionSuggested', 'Invalid'

healthDetails.Description: Health details on this backup item.

lastBackupTime.Description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

protectedItemDataId.Description: Data ID of the protected item.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information on Azure IaaS VM specific backup item.

extendedProperties.Description: Extended Properties for Azure IaasVM Backup.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this backup item.

recoveryPointCount.Description: Number of backup copies available for this backup item.

policyInconsistent.Description: Specifies if backup policy associated with the backup item is inconsistent.

diskLunList.Description: List of Disks' Logical Unit Numbers (LUN) to be used for VM Protection.

isInclusionList.Description: Flag to indicate whether DiskLunList is to be included/ excluded from backup.

protectedItemDataId.Description: Internal ID of a backup item. Used by Azure SQL Backup engine to contact Recovery Services.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of the backed up item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'IRPending', 'Protected', 'ProtectionError', 'ProtectionStopped', 'ProtectionPaused'

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information on Azure Sql specific protected item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: Number of available backup copies associated with this backup item.

policyState.Description: State of the backup policy associated with this backup item.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the DB represented by this backup item.

serverName.Description: Host/Cluster Name for instance or AG

parentName.Description: Parent name of the DB such as Instance or Availability Group.

parentType.Description: Parent type of protected item, example: for a DB, standalone server or distributed

protectionStatus.Description: Backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of this backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'IRPending', 'Protected', 'ProtectionError', 'ProtectionStopped', 'ProtectionPaused'

lastBackupStatus.Description: Last backup operation status. Possible values: Healthy, Unhealthy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Healthy', 'Unhealthy', 'IRPending'

lastBackupTime.Description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

lastBackupErrorDetail.Description: Error Detail class which encapsulates Code, Message and Recommendations.

protectedItemDataSourceId.Description: Data ID of the protected item.

protectedItemHealthStatus.Description: Health status of the backup item, evaluated based on last heartbeat received. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Healthy', 'Unhealthy', 'NotReachable', 'IRPending'

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information on Azure Workload for SQL specific backup item.

message.Description: Error Message related to the Code.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this backup item.

recoveryPointCount.Description: Number of backup copies available for this backup item.

policyState.Description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the managed item

backupEngineName.Description: Backup Management server protecting this backup item

protectionState.Description: Protection state of the backup engine. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'IRPending', 'Protected', 'ProtectionError', 'ProtectionStopped', 'ProtectionPaused'

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information of DPM Protected item.

protectedItemType.Description: Additional information on Backup engine specific backup item.

protectableObjectLoadPath.Description: Attribute to provide information on various DBs.

protected.Description: To check if backup item is disk protected.

isPresentOnCloud.Description: To check if backup item is cloud protected.

lastBackupStatus.Description: Last backup status information on backup item.

lastRefreshedAt.Description: Last refresh time on backup item.

isCollocated.Description: To check if backup item is collocated.

protectionGroupName.Description: Protection group name of the backup item.

policyState.Description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

protectionState.Description: Backup state of this backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'IRPending', 'Protected', 'ProtectionError', 'ProtectionStopped', 'ProtectionPaused'

protectedItemId.Description: Data Plane Service ID of the protected item.

sourceAssociations.Description: Loosely coupled (type, value) associations (example - parent of a protected item)

fabricName.Description: Name of this backup item's fabric.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of this backup item.

computerName.Description: Name of the computer associated with this backup item.

lastBackupTime.Description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

deferredDeleteSyncTimeInUTC.Description: Sync time for deferred deletion in UTC

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information on the backed up item.

lastRefreshedAt.Description: Last time when the agent data synced to service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: Number of backup copies associated with the backup item.

properties.Description: Base class for backup policy. Workload-specific backup policies are derived from this class.

protectedItemsCount.Description: Number of items associated with this policy.

workLoadType.Description: Type of workload for the backup management. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'VM', 'FileFolder', 'AzureSqlDb', 'SQLDB', 'Exchange', 'Sharepoint', 'VMwareVM', 'SystemState', 'Client', 'GenericDataSource', 'SQLDataBase', 'AzureFileShare', 'SAPHanaDatabase', 'SAPAseDatabase'

settings.Description: Common settings field for backup management

subProtectionPolicy.Description: List of sub-protection policies which includes schedule and retention

timeZone.Description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

isCompression.Description:
Workload compression flag. This has been added so that 'isSqlCompression'
will be deprecated once clients upgrade to consider this flag.

policyType.Description: Type of backup policy type. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Full', 'Differential', 'Log', 'CopyOnlyFull', 'Incremental'

scheduleFrequencyInMins.Description: Frequency of the log schedule operation of this policy in minutes.

scheduleRunFrequency.Description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Daily', 'Weekly'

scheduleRunDays.Description: List of days of week this schedule has to be run.

scheduleRunTimes.Description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.Description: At every number weeks this schedule has to be run.

count.Description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

durationType.Description: Retention duration type of retention policy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Days', 'Weeks', 'Months', 'Years'

daysOfTheWeek.Description: List of days of week for weekly retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.Description: Retention schedule format type for monthly retention policy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Daily', 'Weekly'

daysOfTheMonth.Description: List of days of the month.

isLast.Description: Whether Date is last date of month

daysOfTheWeek.Description: List of days of the week.

retentionScheduleFormatType.Description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Daily', 'Weekly'

monthsOfYear.Description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

workLoadType.Description: Type of workload for the backup management. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'VM', 'FileFolder', 'AzureSqlDb', 'SQLDB', 'Exchange', 'Sharepoint', 'VMwareVM', 'SystemState', 'Client', 'GenericDataSource', 'SQLDataBase', 'AzureFileShare', 'SAPHanaDatabase', 'SAPAseDatabase'

timeZone.Description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

instantRpRetentionRangeInDays.Description: Instant RP retention policy range in days

timeZone.Description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

subProtectionPolicy.Description: List of sub-protection policies which includes schedule and retention

timeZone.Description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

properties.Description: Base class for container with backup items. Containers with specific workloads are derived from this class.

backupManagementType.Description: Type of backup management for the container. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql', 'AzureStorage', 'AzureWorkload', 'DefaultBackup'

registrationStatus.Description: Status of registration of the container with the Recovery Services Vault.

healthStatus.Description: Status of health of the container.

resourceGroup.Description: Resource group name of Recovery Services Vault.

protectedItemCount.Description: Number of items backed up in this container.

sourceResourceId.Description: ARM ID of the virtual machine represented by this Azure Workload Container

lastUpdatedTime.Description: Time stamp when this container was updated.

workloadType.Description: Workload type for which registration was sent. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'VM', 'FileFolder', 'AzureSqlDb', 'SQLDB', 'Exchange', 'Sharepoint', 'VMwareVM', 'SystemState', 'Client', 'GenericDataSource', 'SQLDataBase', 'AzureFileShare', 'SAPHanaDatabase', 'SAPAseDatabase'

containerType.Description: Container for the workloads running inside Azure Compute or Classic Compute.

hostServerName.Description: Host Os Name in case of Stand Alone and Cluster Name in case of distributed container.

inquiryInfo.Description: Details about inquired protectable items under a given container.

nodesList.Description: List of the nodes in case of distributed container.

status.Description:
Inquiry Status for this container such as
InProgress | Failed | Succeeded

errorDetail.Description: Error Detail class which encapsulates Code, Message and Recommendations.

inquiryDetails.Description:
Inquiry Details which will have workload specific details.
For e.g. - For SQL and oracle this will contain different details.

type.Description: Type of the Workload such as SQL, Oracle etc.

itemCount.Description: Contains the protectable item Count inside this Container.

inquiryValidation.Description: Validation for inquired protectable items under a given container.

errorDetail.Description: Error Detail class which encapsulates Code, Message and Recommendations.

additionalDetail.Description: Error Additional Detail in case the status is non-success.

nodeName.Description: Name of the node under a distributed container.

status.Description:
Status of this Node.
Failed | Succeeded

errorDetail.Description: Error Detail class which encapsulates Code, Message and Recommendations.

canReRegister.Description: Specifies whether the container is re-registrable.

protectedItemCount.Description: Number of protected items in the BackupEngine

dpmServers.Description: List of BackupEngines protecting the container

lastRefreshedAt.Description: Last refresh time of the DPMContainer.

containerType.Description: Base class for generic container of backup items

serviceEndpoints.Description: Azure Backup Service Endpoints for the container

servicePrincipalClientId.Description: Protection container identity - AAD Service Principal

virtualMachineId.Description: Fully qualified ARM url of the virtual machine represented by this Azure IaaS VM container.

virtualMachineVersion.Description: Specifies whether the container represents a Classic or an Azure Resource Manager VM.

resourceGroup.Description: Resource group name of Recovery Services Vault.

canReRegister.Description: Can the container be registered one more time.

protectedItemCount.Description: Number of items backed up in this container.

mabContainerHealthDetails.Description: Health details on this mab container.

containerType.Description: Container with items backed up using MAB backup engine.

lastRefreshedAt.Description: Time stamp when this container was refreshed.

backupItemType.Description: Type of backup items associated with this container. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'VM', 'FileFolder', 'AzureSqlDb', 'SQLDB', 'Exchange', 'Sharepoint', 'VMwareVM', 'SystemState', 'Client', 'GenericDataSource', 'SQLDataBase', 'AzureFileShare', 'SAPHanaDatabase', 'SAPAseDatabase'

backupItems.Description: List of backup items associated with this container.

policyName.Description: Backup policy associated with this container.

lastBackupStatus.Description: Latest backup status of this container.
